data.pageDesc: This is a Multiple Choice Single Select Page. Containing four radio buttons. Please select corect option and click submit.
data.pageText:
Updates:
  • displayTickCross: Reveal correct and incorrect answers by showing Tick [✔] or Cross [✖] next to options. Skin and position of Tick and Cross can be changed through CSS.
    tickCrossType: 
    [default/compact]
    - By default Tick or Cross is displayed next to all options. However in some case Tick or Cross should be displayed next to user selected and correct options. To handle second case value of this attribute should be set as “compact”. Default value is “default”).
    tickCrossTrigger: 
    [default/submit]
    - Correct options (Tick/Cross) will be displayed after Feedback Popup is closed. In some cases correct answer needs to be displayed along with feedback (on clicking Submit button). To handle this scenario, value to this parameter should be set as “submit”. Default value is "default"
